Package com.meltmedia.cadmium.core.config

Interface Summary
ConfigurationListener<T> An interface for any class that is interested in configuration updates for specific configuration types.
ConfigurationParser An interface of a Configuration Parser that will be created for each configuration update.
PropertiesReader PropertiesReader Interface.
PropertiesWriter This implements the PropertiesWriter Interface.
 

Class Summary
ConfigManager This centralizes and manages how other classes read and write to properties files.
ConfigurationParserFactory Simplifies the logic of getting a new instance of ConfigurationParser from the Guice Injector.
ConfigurationParserProvider Guice Provider that will create new instances of the ConfigurationParser that will be provided through a Guice Injector.
 

Exception Summary
ConfigurationNotFoundException  
InvalidConfigurationException  
 

Annotation Types Summary
CadmiumConfig Annotates a class as a configuration Object to be filled in with the configuration data.
ConfigurationClass Annotation to bind ConfigurationClasses in Guice.
ConfigurationParserClass Annotates a binding of the class of the implementation of the ConfigurationParser interface.
